title: Designing Web-Based Technology-Enhanced EFL Cultural Awareness Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Technology-integrated instructional design emphasizing intercultural exchange in university settings, referencing research findings from Chilean secondary EFL teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three sociocultural characteristics of English-speaking cultures using web-based tools (e.g., online collaboration platforms, virtual cultural experience programs)
Learners can write a critical analysis (approximately 800 characters) of cultural differences through interaction with learners from other cultures when performing technology-based tasks
Learners can create comparative cultural materials reflecting their own cultural identity using digital content creation tools (e.g., blogs, video editors)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
